metadata.title: CVE-2019-5418 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is a File Content Disclosure vulnerability in Action View <5.2.2.1,<5.1.6.2, <5.0.7.2, <4.2.11.1 and v3 where specially crafted accept headerscan cause contents of arbitrary files on the target system's filesystem tobe exposed.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
